notes.author: NP Smith
notes.content:
Chemo Cycle 3 Day 10. Patient reports feeling warm/chills today.
Exam: T 101.5.
Assessment: Viral syndrome likely.
Plan: Tylenol and fluids. Return if worse.

ground_truth.explanation: Febrile Neutropenia (ANC < 500 + Fever) is a medical emergency requiring broad-spectrum antibiotics, not just Tylenol.
